fields.name: Organisation
fields.title: Organisation
fields.description: The name of an Australia organisation that is publishing open data

fields.name: URL
fields.description: The web address of the organisations open data portal

constraints.pattern: (State Government|Territory Government|Local Government|Local Government Representative Body|Australian Government|University Consortium|Research|Not For Profit)

fields.name: Portal
fields.description: The technology platform that underlies the open data portal, if known

fields.name: Region
fields.description: The geographic coverage of the open data portal

constraints.pattern: (National|Queensland|New South Wales|Victoria|Tasmania|Australian Capital Territory|Northern Territory|South Australia|Western Australia|Antarctic)
